Ten Test Case: Dang ky tai khoan thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the dang ky tai khoan moi voi thong tin hop le
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email chua ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /register; 2. Nhap email hop le; 3. Nhap password (toi thieu 6 ky tu); 4. Nhap ho ten day du; 5. Click nut Dang ky
Du Lieu Test: email: test@example.com, password: 123456, fullName: Nguyen Van A
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. He thong gui OTP ve email; 2. Chuyen sang man hinh nhap OTP; 3. User duoc tao voi trang thai emailVerified=false; 4. User nhan 20 credits ban dau

Ten Test Case: Dang ky voi email da ton tai
Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi dang ky voi email da co trong DB
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email da ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /register; 2. Nhap email da ton tai; 3. Nhap cac thong tin khac hop le; 4. Click nut Dang ky
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Email da duoc su dung'

Ten Test Case: Dang ky voi email khong hop le
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation email
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /register; 2. Nhap email khong hop le; 3. Click nut Dang ky
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi email khong hop le

Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation password
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /register; 2. Nhap email hop le; 3. Nhap password ngan hon 6 ky tu; 4. Click nut Dang ky
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi password khong du dai

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the xac thuc email bang OTP dung
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang ky, nhan duoc OTP qua email
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Nhap ma OTP 6 so dung; 2. Click nut Xac thuc
Du Lieu Test: otp: ma OTP nhan qua email
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. emailVerified = true; 2. Chuyen sang trang dang nhap; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Xac thuc thanh cong'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi OTP khong dung
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Nhap ma OTP sai; 2. Click nut Xac thuc
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Ma OTP khong dung'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi OTP da het han
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang ky, OTP da het han (sau 5 phut)
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Cho OTP het han; 2. Nhap ma OTP dung; 3. Click nut Xac thuc
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Ma OTP da het han'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang gui lai ma OTP
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang ky, dang o man hinh nhap OTP
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click nut 'Gui lai ma'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Gui OTP moi ve email; 2. OTP cu bi vo hieu hoa; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Da gui lai ma OTP'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the dang nhap voi thong tin dung
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang ky va xac thuc email
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Nhap email dung; 3. Nhap password dung; 4. Click nut Dang nhap
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Dang nhap thanh cong; 2. Chuyen ve trang chu; 3. Luu JWT token vao cookie; 4. Hien thi thong tin user tren header

Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi dang nhap voi password khong dung
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Nhap email dung; 3. Nhap password sai; 4. Click nut Dang nhap
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Email hoac mat khau khong dung'

Ten Test Case: Dang nhap voi email chua xac thuc
Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi dang nhap khi email chua verify
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang ky nhung chua xac thuc OTP
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Nhap email va password dung; 3. Click nut Dang nhap
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Vui long xac thuc email truoc khi dang nhap'

Ten Test Case: Dang nhap voi tai khoan bi vo hieu hoa
Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong tu choi dang nhap khi account disabled
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Nhap email va password dung; 3. Click nut Dang nhap
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Tai khoan da bi vo hieu hoa'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user moi co the dang nhap bang Google
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email Google chua ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Click nut 'Dang nhap voi Google'; 3. Chon tai khoan Google; 4. Cho phep quyen truy cap
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao user moi voi emailVerified=true; 2. User nhan 20 credits; 3. Dang nhap thanh cong; 4. Chuyen ve trang chu

Ten Test Case: Dang nhap Google voi email da ton tai
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the lien ket Google voi tai khoan cu
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email Google da ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /login; 2. Click nut 'Dang nhap voi Google'; 3. Chon tai khoan Google co email da dang ky
Du Lieu Test: Google account voi email da dang ky
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Dang nhap vao tai khoan co san; 2. Khong tao tai khoan moi

Ten Test Case: Quen mat khau - Gui OTP thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang gui OTP reset password
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /forgot-password; 2. Nhap email da dang ky; 3. Click nut 'Gui ma xac nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Gui OTP ve email; 2. Chuyen sang man hinh nhap OTP va password moi

Ten Test Case: Quen mat khau - Email khong ton tai
Mo Ta: Kiem tra he thong xu ly email khong ton tai
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Email khong ton tai trong he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /forgot-password; 2. Nhap email khong ton tai; 3. Click nut 'Gui ma xac nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Email khong ton tai trong he thong'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the dat lai mat khau moi
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da nhan OTP reset password
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Nhap ma OTP dung; 2. Nhap mat khau moi; 3. Click nut 'Dat lai mat khau'
Du Lieu Test: otp: ma OTP dung, newPassword: newpass123
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Password duoc cap nhat; 2. Co the dang nhap voi password moi; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Dat lai mat khau thanh cong'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the dang xuat khoi he thong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click avatar tren header; 2. Click nut 'Dang xuat'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Xoa JWT token; 2. Xoa refresh token; 3. Chuyen ve trang login; 4. Khong the truy cap cac trang protected

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the xem thong tin profile cua minh
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click avatar tren header; 2. Click 'Trang ca nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi day du thong tin: fullName, email, avatar, bio, skills, location, company, title, trustScore, untrustScore, credits, balance

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat thong tin co ban
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the cap nhat thong tin profile
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Click nut 'Chinh sua'; 3. Thay doi cac thong tin: fullName, phoneNumber, title, location, company, bio; 4. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Thong tin duoc cap nhat; 2. Hien thi thong bao 'Cap nhat thanh cong'; 3. Trang profile hien thi thong tin moi

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the upload avatar moi
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Click vao avatar; 3. Chon file anh (jpg/png, duoi 200KB); 4. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Avatar duoc upload len Cloudinary; 2. Avatar moi hien thi tren profile; 3. Avatar moi hien thi tren header

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat avatar voi file qua lon
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation kich thuoc file avatar
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Click vao avatar; 3. Chon file anh lon hon 200KB
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Kich thuoc file khong duoc vuot qua 200KB'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the cap nhat danh sach skills
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Them/xoa cac skills; 3. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Skills duoc cap nhat; 2. Hien thi danh sach skills moi tren profile

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat thong tin ngan hang
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the cap nhat thong tin ngan hang
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Nhap so tai khoan ngan hang; 3. Nhap ten ngan hang; 4. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Thong tin ngan hang duoc luu; 2. hasBankInfo = true

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the bat isOpenToWork
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang profile; 2. Bat toggle 'Dang tim viec'; 3. Chon cac vi tri muon nhan; 4. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. isOpenToWork = true; 2. Hien thi badge 'Dang tim viec' tren profile

Ten Test Case: Dang ky lam Employer thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the them role EMPLOYER
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang nhap, chua co role EMPLOYER
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang dang viec; 2. Click nut 'Tro thanh Ben thue'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. User co them role ROLE_EMPLOYER; 2. Co the truy cap cac chuc nang dang viec

Ten Test Case: Nhan credits daily lan dau trong ngay
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user nhan duoc 10 credits khi dang nhap lan dau trong ngay
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User chua nhan credits hom nay (lastDailyCreditDate != today)
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Dang nhap vao he thong
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. credits += 10; 2. lastDailyCreditDate = today; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Ban da nhan 10 credits hom nay'

Ten Test Case: Khong nhan credits khi da nhan trong ngay
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user khong nhan them credits neu da nhan
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da nhan credits hom nay
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Dang xuat; 2. Dang nhap lai
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. credits khong thay doi; 2. Khong hien thi thong bao nhan credits

Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the tao job moi
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User co role EMPLOYER, co bankInfo, co du so du
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Nhap title (bat buoc); 3. Nhap description (bat buoc); 4. Nhap budget (bat buoc); 5. Nhap cac thong tin khac; 6. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Du Lieu Test: title: 'Thiet ke logo', description: 'Can thiet ke logo cho startup', budget: 1000000, skills: ['Design', 'Photoshop'], complexity: 'INTERMEDIATE', duration: 'SHORT_TERM', workType: 'PART_TIME', submissionDays: 3, reviewDays: 2
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Job duoc tao voi status = PENDING_APPROVAL; 2. Tru tien escrow = budget + 5% = 1,050,000 VND tu so du; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Tao job thanh cong, dang cho admin duyet'; 4. Chuyen ve trang /my-posted-jobs

Ten Test Case: Tao job khi chua co thong tin ngan hang
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation thong tin ngan hang khi tao job
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User co role EMPLOYER, chua co bankInfo
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Nhap day du thong tin job; 3. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Vui long cap nhat so tai khoan ngan hang trong profile truoc khi dang tin tuyen dung'

Ten Test Case: Tao job khi khong du so du
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation so du khi tao job
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User co role EMPLOYER, co bankInfo, so du khong du
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Nhap budget = 10,000,000 VND; 3. User co balance = 1,000,000 VND; 4. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Khong du so du de dang job. Can 10,500,000 VND (gom phi 5%)'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation budget khi tao job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Khong nhap budget; 3. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Job can khai bao ngan sach hop le'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation submissionDays
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Nhap submissionDays = 0; 3. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: He thong tu dong set submissionDays = 1 (gia tri mac dinh)

Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation reviewDays
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs/create; 2. Nhap reviewDays = 1; 3. Click nut 'Dang viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: He thong tu dong set reviewDays = 2 (gia tri mac dinh)

Ten Test Case: Xem danh sach jobs dang tuyen
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the xem danh sach jobs cong khai
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /jobs
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi danh sach jobs co status = OPEN; 2. Phan trang hoat dong dung; 3. Co the sap xep theo createdAt, budget

Ten Test Case: Xem danh sach jobs cua toi (Employer)
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the xem danh sach jobs minh dang
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User co role EMPLOYER, da dang jobs
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /my-posted-jobs
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi tat ca jobs do user dang; 2. Co the loc theo status; 3. Hien thi dung trang thai tung job

Ten Test Case: Xem danh sach jobs dang lam (Freelancer)
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the xem danh sach jobs dang lam
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /my-accepted-jobs
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi jobs co application ACCEPTED cua user; 2. Hien thi workStatus cua tung job; 3. Hien thi deadline nop san pham

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang tim kiem jobs
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /jobs; 2. Nhap keyword vao o tim kiem; 3. Click nut tim kiem
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi jobs co title hoac description chua keyword; 2. Chi hien thi jobs co status = OPEN

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang tim kiem jobs theo skills
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang /jobs; 2. Chon skills filter
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi jobs co chua it nhat 1 skill da chon

Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the xem chi tiet job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi day du thong tin job; 2. Tang viewCount + 1; 3. Hien thi thong tin employer

Ten Test Case: Xem chi tiet job khong ton tai
Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi job khong ton tai
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/999999
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi trang 404; 2. Hoac thong bao 'Cong viec khong ton tai'

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat job o trang thai DRAFT
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the cap nhat job DRAFT
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/edit; 2. Thay doi thong tin job; 3. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Job duoc cap nhat; 2. Hien thi thong bao 'Cap nhat job thanh cong'

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat job khong phai DRAFT
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the cap nhat job khong o trang thai DRAFT
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/edit; 2. Thay doi thong tin job; 3. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Chi co the chinh sua job o trang thai Ban nhap'

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat job da co nguoi ung tuyen
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the cap nhat job da co application
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/edit; 2. Thay doi thong tin job; 3. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Khong the chinh sua job da co nguoi ung tuyen'

Ten Test Case: Cap nhat job cua nguoi khac
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the cap nhat job khong thuoc so huu
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job khong thuoc user hien tai
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/edit voi job cua nguoi khac
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Ban khong co quyen sua job nay'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra co the xoa job o cac trang thai cho phep
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job co status = DRAFT hoac PENDING_APPROVAL hoac REJECTED
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs; 2. Click nut 'Xoa' tren job; 3. Xac nhan xoa
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Job bi xoa khoi database; 2. Hoan tien escrow cho employer (neu DRAFT hoac PENDING_APPROVAL); 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Xoa job thanh cong'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the xoa job dang hoat dong
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job co status = OPEN hoac IN_PROGRESS
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs; 2. Click nut 'Xoa' tren job
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Chi co the xoa job o trang thai Ban nhap, Cho duyet hoac Bi tu choi'

Ten Test Case: Xoa job da co nguoi ung tuyen
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the xoa job da co application
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs; 2. Click nut 'Xoa' tren job
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Khong the xoa job da co nguoi ung tuyen'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the ung tuyen job
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job co status = OPEN, User chua ung tuyen job nay
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Click nut 'Ung tuyen'; 3. Nhap cover letter (tuy chon); 4. Click nut 'Gui'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao application moi voi status = PENDING; 2. applicationCount cua job += 1; 3. Hien thi thong bao 'Ung tuyen thanh cong'; 4. Gui notification cho employer

Ten Test Case: Ung tuyen job da ung tuyen truoc do
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the ung tuyen job da ung tuyen
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da co application cho job nay
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Click nut 'Ung tuyen'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Khong hien thi nut 'Ung tuyen'; 2. Hien thi trang thai application hien tai

Ten Test Case: Ung tuyen job khong phai OPEN
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the ung tuyen job khong dang tuyen
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id} voi job co status = IN_PROGRESS; 2. Click nut 'Ung tuyen'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Khong hien thi nut 'Ung tuyen'; 2. Hoac hien thi thong bao 'Cong viec khong con tuyen dung'

Ten Test Case: Ung tuyen job cua chinh minh
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer khong the ung tuyen job cua minh
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id} voi job minh dang; 2. Click nut 'Ung tuyen'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Khong hien thi nut 'Ung tuyen'; 2. Hien thi cac nut quan ly job thay the

Ten Test Case: Rut don ung tuyen thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the rut don ung tuyen
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-applications hoac /jobs/{id}; 2. Click nut 'Rut don'; 3. Xac nhan rut don
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Application status = WITHDRAWN; 2. Hien thi thong bao 'Da rut don ung tuyen'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the rut don da duoc chap nhan
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Co gang rut don da duoc accept
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Khong cho phep rut don, phai dung tinh nang Withdrawal Request

Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the xem danh sach ung vien
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User la employer cua job, job co applications
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/applications
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi danh sach tat ca applications; 2. Hien thi thong tin freelancer: fullName, avatar, skills, trustScore, coverLetter

Ten Test Case: Chap nhan ung vien thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the accept application
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job status = OPEN, Application status = PENDING
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/applications; 2. Click nut 'Chap nhan' tren application
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Application status = ACCEPTED; 2. Job status = IN_PROGRESS; 3. Set workSubmissionDeadline = now + submissionDays; 4. Cac application khac tu dong REJECTED; 5. Gui notification cho freelancer; 6. Ghi log vao job history

Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the reject application
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}/applications; 2. Click nut 'Tu choi' tren application
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Application status = REJECTED; 2. Gui notification cho freelancer; 3. Ghi log vao job history

Ten Test Case: Accept khi da co nguoi duoc accept
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the accept khi job da co freelancer
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Co gang accept mot application khac
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Khong cho phep accept them

Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the nop san pham
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-accepted-jobs; 2. Click job dang lam; 3. Click nut 'Nop san pham'; 4. Nhap URL san pham; 5. Nhap ghi chu (tuy chon); 6. Click nut 'Gui'
Du Lieu Test: url: 'https://drive.google.com/file/xxx', note: 'Da hoan thanh theo yeu cau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. workStatus = SUBMITTED; 2. workSubmittedAt = now; 3. Set workReviewDeadline = now + reviewDays; 4. Gui notification cho employer; 5. Ghi log vao job history

Ten Test Case: Nop san pham khi bi yeu cau chinh sua
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the nop lai sau khi bi yeu cau revision
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap job co workStatus = REVISION_REQUESTED; 2. Click nut 'Nop lai'; 3. Nhap URL moi; 4. Click nut 'Gui'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. workStatus = SUBMITTED; 2. workRevisionNote = null; 3. Reset workReviewDeadline; 4. Ghi log WORK_REVISED vao history

Ten Test Case: Nop san pham khi da duoc duyet
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the nop lai khi da approved
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Co gang nop san pham khi da approved
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Khong hien thi nut nop san pham

Ten Test Case: Nop san pham khong co URL
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation URL khi nop san pham
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click nut 'Nop san pham'; 2. Khong nhap URL; 3. Click nut 'Gui'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Vui long nhap URL san pham'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the approve cong viec
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Xem san pham da nop; 3. Click nut 'Duyet'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. workStatus = APPROVED; 2. Job status = COMPLETED; 3. Thanh toan budget cho freelancer (freelancer.balance += budget); 4. Cong trustScore cho freelancer; 5. Gui notification PAYMENT_RELEASED, JOB_COMPLETED; 6. Ghi log vao job history

Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the yeu cau revision
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Xem san pham da nop; 3. Click nut 'Yeu cau chinh sua'; 4. Nhap ghi chu yeu cau; 5. Click nut 'Gui'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. workStatus = REVISION_REQUESTED; 2. workRevisionNote = note; 3. Reset workSubmissionDeadline; 4. Gui notification cho freelancer; 5. Ghi log vao job history

Ten Test Case: Freelancer timeout - Khong nop san pham dung han
Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi freelancer qua han nop
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Scheduler chay kiem tra deadline; 2. Phat hien job qua han
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Application status = REJECTED; 2. Clear work submission data; 3. Job status = OPEN (mo lai); 4. Tru trustScore cua freelancer; 5. Gui notification cho ca 2 ben; 6. Ghi log FREELANCER_TIMEOUT, JOB_REOPENED

Ten Test Case: Employer timeout - Khong review dung han
Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi employer qua han review
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Scheduler chay kiem tra deadline; 2. Phat hien review qua han
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tu dong approve: workStatus = APPROVED; 2. Job status = COMPLETED; 3. Thanh toan cho freelancer; 4. Gui notification cho ca 2 ben; 5. Ghi log EMPLOYER_TIMEOUT, AUTO_APPROVED

Ten Test Case: Freelancer gui yeu cau rut thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the xin rut khoi job
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job status = IN_PROGRESS, User la freelancer cua job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-accepted-jobs; 2. Click job muon rut; 3. Click nut 'Xin rut'; 4. Nhap ly do; 5. Click nut 'Gui'
Du Lieu Test: reason: 'Toi khong the tiep tuc vi ly do ca nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao WithdrawalRequest voi type = FREELANCER_WITHDRAW; 2. status = PENDING; 3. Tinh penaltyFee va penaltyPercent; 4. Gui notification cho employer; 5. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED

Ten Test Case: Employer chap nhan yeu cau rut cua freelancer
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the approve withdrawal request
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Xem yeu cau rut; 3. Click nut 'Chap nhan'; 4. Nhap message (tuy chon)
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. WithdrawalRequest status = APPROVED; 2. Application status = REJECTED; 3. Clear work submission data; 4. Job status = OPEN (mo lai); 5. Tru untrustScore cua freelancer; 6. Gui notification cho freelancer; 7. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_APPROVED, JOB_REOPENED

Ten Test Case: Employer tu choi yeu cau rut cua freelancer
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the reject withdrawal request
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Xem yeu cau rut; 3. Click nut 'Tu choi'; 4. Nhap message
Du Lieu Test: message: 'Vui long hoan thanh cong viec'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. WithdrawalRequest status = REJECTED; 2. Job van IN_PROGRESS; 3. Gui notification cho freelancer; 4. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_REJECTED

Ten Test Case: Employer gui yeu cau huy thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the xin huy job dang lam
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Job status = IN_PROGRESS, User la employer cua job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-posted-jobs; 2. Click job muon huy; 3. Click nut 'Xin huy'; 4. Nhap ly do; 5. Click nut 'Gui'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao WithdrawalRequest voi type = EMPLOYER_CANCEL; 2. status = PENDING; 3. Gui notification cho freelancer; 4. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED

Ten Test Case: Freelancer chap nhan yeu cau huy cua employer
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the approve cancel request
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /my-accepted-jobs; 2. Xem yeu cau huy; 3. Click nut 'Chap nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. WithdrawalRequest status = APPROVED; 2. Job status = CANCELLED; 3. Hoan tien escrow cho employer (tru penaltyFee); 4. Cong compensation cho freelancer (neu co); 5. Gui notification cho employer; 6. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_APPROVED, JOB_CANCELLED

Mo Ta: Kiem tra nguoi yeu cau co the tu huy request
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Co WithdrawalRequest pending do user tao
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap trang job; 2. Click nut 'Huy yeu cau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. WithdrawalRequest status = CANCELLED; 2. Job van giu nguyen trang thai; 3. Ghi log WITHDRAWAL_CANCELLED

Ten Test Case: Employer tao tranh chap thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer co the tao dispute
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Click nut 'Khieu nai'; 3. Upload file bang chung (PDF); 4. Nhap mo ta sai pham; 5. Click nut 'Gui'
Du Lieu Test: evidenceFile: PDF file, description: 'San pham khong dung yeu cau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao Dispute voi status = PENDING_FREELANCER_RESPONSE; 2. Job status = DISPUTED; 3. Clear workReviewDeadline; 4. Gui notification cho freelancer va admin; 5. Ghi log DISPUTE_CREATED

Ten Test Case: Tao tranh chap khi job khong IN_PROGRESS
Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the tao dispute khi job khong phu hop
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Co gang tao dispute cho job khong IN_PROGRESS
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Khong cho phep tao dispute

Ten Test Case: Freelancer gui phan hoi thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra freelancer co the phan hoi dispute
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Dispute status = PENDING_FREELANCER_RESPONSE, con trong deadline
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Xem dispute; 3. Upload file bang chung phan hoi; 4. Nhap mo ta phan hoi; 5. Click nut 'Gui'
Du Lieu Test: evidenceFile: PDF file, description: 'Toi da lam dung yeu cau ban dau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Cap nhat freelancerEvidenceUrl, freelancerDescription; 2. Dispute status = PENDING_ADMIN_DECISION; 3. Gui notification cho employer va admin; 4. Ghi log DISPUTE_RESPONSE_SUBMITTED

Mo Ta: Kiem tra khong the phan hoi sau deadline
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Co gang gui phan hoi sau deadline
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Khong cho phep gui phan hoi; 2. Hien thi thong bao 'Da het han phan hoi'

Ten Test Case: Admin set deadline cho freelancer phan hoi
Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the set deadline phan hoi
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Admin truy cap /admin/disputes; 2. Click dispute; 3. Set so ngay phan hoi (mac dinh 3); 4. Click nut 'Yeu cau phan hoi'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. freelancerDeadline = now + 3 days; 2. Gui notification cho freelancer

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the resolve cho employer
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Admin truy cap /admin/disputes; 2. Click dispute; 3. Xem bang chung 2 ben; 4. Chon 'Employer thang'; 5. Nhap ghi chu; 6. Click nut 'Quyet dinh'
Du Lieu Test: employerWins: true, note: 'Freelancer khong hoan thanh dung yeu cau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Dispute status = EMPLOYER_WON; 2. Job status = CANCELLED; 3. Hoan tien escrow cho employer; 4. Tru untrustScore cua freelancer; 5. Gui notification DISPUTE_RESOLVED_WIN cho employer; 6. Gui notification DISPUTE_RESOLVED_LOSE cho freelancer; 7. Ghi log DISPUTE_RESOLVED

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the resolve cho freelancer
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Admin truy cap /admin/disputes; 2. Click dispute; 3. Xem bang chung 2 ben; 4. Chon 'Freelancer thang'; 5. Nhap ghi chu; 6. Click nut 'Quyet dinh'
Du Lieu Test: employerWins: false, note: 'Freelancer da hoan thanh dung yeu cau'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Dispute status = FREELANCER_WON; 2. Job status = COMPLETED; 3. Thanh toan budget cho freelancer; 4. Cong trustScore cho freelancer; 5. Gui notification DISPUTE_RESOLVED_WIN cho freelancer; 6. Gui notification DISPUTE_RESOLVED_LOSE cho employer; 7. Ghi log DISPUTE_RESOLVED

Ten Test Case: Tao don nap tien thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the tao don nap tien
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /wallet; 2. Nhap so tien muon nap; 3. Click nut 'Nap tien'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao BalanceDeposit voi status = PENDING; 2. Hien thi QR code ZaloPay; 3. Hien thi URL thanh toan; 4. Set expiredAt = now + 15 minutes

Mo Ta: Kiem tra cap nhat so du sau khi thanh toan
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. User thanh toan qua ZaloPay; 2. ZaloPay goi callback
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. BalanceDeposit status = PAID; 2. paidAt = now; 3. user.balance += amount

Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi don nap het han
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Scheduler chay kiem tra; 2. Hoac user query trang thai
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. BalanceDeposit status = EXPIRED; 2. So du khong thay doi

Ten Test Case: Nap tien voi so tien khong hop le
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation so tien nap
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /wallet; 2. Nhap so tien <= 0; 3. Click nut 'Nap tien'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'So tien khong hop le'

Ten Test Case: Mua goi credits BASIC thanh cong
Mo Ta: Kiem tra user co the mua credits bang so du
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /wallet; 2. Chon goi BASIC (1 credit - 10,000 VND); 3. Click nut 'Mua'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. user.balance -= 10,000; 2. user.credits += 1; 3. Tao CreditPurchase record; 4. Hien thi thong bao 'Mua credits thanh cong'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra mua goi 100 credits
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Chon goi STANDARD (100 credits - 650,000 VND); 2. Click nut 'Mua'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. user.balance -= 650,000; 2. user.credits += 100

Mo Ta: Kiem tra mua goi 1000 credits
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Chon goi PREMIUM (1000 credits - 4,250,000 VND); 2. Click nut 'Mua'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. user.balance -= 4,250,000; 2. user.credits += 1000

Ten Test Case: Mua credits khi khong du so du
Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation so du khi mua credits
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Chon goi credits; 2. Click nut 'Mua'
Du Lieu Test: User co balance = 5,000, mua goi BASIC (10,000)
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi thong bao loi 'Khong du so du'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang tim kiem user de ket ban
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /messages; 2. Click nut 'Tim ban'; 3. Nhap email; 4. Click nut tim
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi danh sach users co email chua keyword; 2. Hien thi relationStatus voi moi user; 3. Khong hien thi user hien tai

Mo Ta: Kiem tra gui yeu cau chat lan dau
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Chua co conversation voi user do
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Tim user; 2. Click nut 'Ket ban'; 3. Nhap tin nhan dau tien; 4. Click nut 'Gui'
Du Lieu Test: receiverId: 2, message: 'Xin chao, toi muon ket noi voi ban'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao Conversation voi status = PENDING; 2. Tao ChatMessage dau tien; 3. Gui notification cho receiver

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chap nhan yeu cau ket ban
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /messages; 2. Xem tab 'Yeu cau ket ban'; 3. Click nut 'Chap nhan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Conversation status = ACCEPTED; 2. Co the nhan tin binh thuong; 3. Gui notification cho nguoi gui

Mo Ta: Kiem tra tu choi yeu cau ket ban
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Xem tab 'Yeu cau ket ban'; 2. Click nut 'Tu choi'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Conversation status = REJECTED; 2. Nguoi gui co the gui lai sau

Mo Ta: Kiem tra gui tin nhan van ban
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation; 2. Nhap tin nhan; 3. Click nut 'Gui' hoac Enter
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao ChatMessage voi status = SENT; 2. Tin nhan hien thi realtime qua WebSocket; 3. Gui notification neu receiver offline; 4. Cap nhat lastActivityAt cua conversation

Mo Ta: Kiem tra gui hinh anh trong chat
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation; 2. Click nut dinh kem; 3. Chon file anh
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Upload anh len Cloudinary; 2. Tao ChatMessage voi type = IMAGE; 3. fileUrl chua URL anh

Mo Ta: Kiem tra gui file trong chat
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation; 2. Click nut dinh kem; 3. Chon file (PDF, doc, etc.)
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Upload file len Cloudinary; 2. Tao ChatMessage voi type = FILE; 3. fileName, fileUrl duoc luu

Mo Ta: Kiem tra tin nhan duoc danh dau da doc
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation co tin nhan chua doc
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tat ca tin nhan cua nguoi khac doi status = READ; 2. Gui realtime update cho sender; 3. Hien thi tich da doc cho sender

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chinh sua tin nhan da gui
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Tin nhan thuoc user hien tai
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click chuot phai vao tin nhan; 2. Chon 'Chinh sua'; 3. Sua noi dung; 4. Click 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. content duoc cap nhat; 2. isEdited = true; 3. Hien thi '(da chinh sua)'; 4. Cap nhat realtime cho receiver

Mo Ta: Kiem tra xoa tin nhan da gui
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: Tin nhan thuoc user hien tai
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click chuot phai vao tin nhan; 2. Chon 'Xoa'; 3. Xac nhan xoa
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. isDeleted = true; 2. Hien thi 'Tin nhan da bi xoa'; 3. Cap nhat realtime cho receiver

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang block user
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation; 2. Click menu options; 3. Click 'Chan nguoi dung'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. isBlocked = true; 2. Khong nhan tin nhan tu user bi chan; 3. User bi chan khong the gui tin nhan; 4. Hien thi 'Ban da chan nguoi dung nay'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang unblock user
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation voi user da chan; 2. Click 'Bo chan'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. isBlocked = false; 2. Co the nhan tin binh thuong

Mo Ta: Kiem tra hien thi trang thai hoat dong
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Mo conversation; 2. Quan sat trang thai cua doi phuong
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Neu online: hien thi 'Dang hoat dong'; 2. Neu offline: hien thi 'Hoat dong X phut truoc'

Ten Test Case: Nhan notification khi co application moi
Mo Ta: Kiem tra employer nhan notification khi co nguoi ung tuyen
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User la employer, co nguoi ung tuyen job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Freelancer ung tuyen job
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Employer nhan notification loai NEW_APPLICATION; 2. Realtime notification qua WebSocket; 3. Badge so notification tang

Mo Ta: Kiem tra mark read notification
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click vao notification
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. isRead = true; 2. Chuyen den trang lien quan; 3. Badge so giam

Ten Test Case: Danh dau da doc tat ca
Mo Ta: Kiem tra mark all as read
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click nut 'Danh dau tat ca da doc'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tat ca notification.isRead = true; 2. Badge so = 0

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang save job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /jobs/{id}; 2. Click nut 'Luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tao SavedJob record; 2. Icon doi thanh 'Da luu'; 3. Job xuat hien trong /saved-jobs

Mo Ta: Kiem tra chuc nang unsave job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click nut 'Da luu'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Xoa SavedJob record; 2. Icon doi ve 'Luu'; 3. Job bien mat khoi /saved-jobs

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the xem tat ca users
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /admin/users
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi danh sach tat ca users; 2. Phan trang hoat dong; 3. Co the tim kiem, loc

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the disable user
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /admin/users; 2. Click user; 3. Click nut 'Vo hieu hoa'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. user.enabled = false; 2. User khong the dang nhap

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the enable user
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click nut 'Kich hoat' tren user da disable
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. user.enabled = true; 2. User co the dang nhap

Ten Test Case: Xem danh sach jobs cho duyet
Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the xem jobs pending approval
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /admin/jobs; 2. Loc theo status = PENDING_APPROVAL
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi danh sach jobs dang cho duyet

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the approve job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click job; 2. Xem chi tiet; 3. Click nut 'Duyet'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Job status = OPEN; 2. Gui notification JOB_APPROVED cho employer; 3. Ghi log JOB_APPROVED

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the reject job
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Click job; 2. Click nut 'Tu choi'; 3. Nhap ly do; 4. Click 'Xac nhan'
Du Lieu Test: jobId: 1, reason: 'Noi dung khong phu hop'
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Job status = REJECTED; 2. Gui notification JOB_REJECTED cho employer (co ly do); 3. Ghi log JOB_REJECTED voi reason

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the xem thong ke balance
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /admin/balance
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi tong so tien nap; 2. Hien thi so giao dich theo status; 3. Bieu do theo ngay/thang

Mo Ta: Kiem tra admin co the xem thong ke payment
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Truy cap /admin/payments
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Hien thi tong so tien thanh toan; 2. Phi he thong thu duoc; 3. Bieu do theo thoi gian

Ten Test Case: Truy cap trang admin khi khong phai admin
Mo Ta: Kiem tra phan quyen admin
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Dang nhap user thuong; 2. Truy cap /admin/*
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Redirect ve trang 403 hoac trang chu; 2. Khong hien thi menu admin

Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi JWT het han
Dieu Kien Tien Quyet: User da dang nhap, JWT het han
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Cho JWT het han; 2. Thuc hien action bat ky
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Tu dong refresh token (neu co refresh token); 2. Hoac redirect ve trang login

Mo Ta: Kiem tra xu ly khi 2 employer cung accept 1 freelancer
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Employer A click accept; 2. Employer B click accept cung luc
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Chi 1 job duoc accept; 2. Job con lai hien thi loi

Mo Ta: Kiem tra validation kich thuoc file
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Upload file > 5MB (hoac limit quy dinh)
Ket Qua Mong Doi: Hien thi loi 'File vuot qua kich thuoc cho phep'

Mo Ta: Kiem tra bao mat input
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Nhap payload SQL vao cac input
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Khong bi loi server; 2. Input duoc escape dung; 3. Khong thuc thi SQL doc hai

Mo Ta: Kiem tra bao mat XSS
Buoc Thuc Hien: 1. Nhap script tag vao cac input
Ket Qua Mong Doi: 1. Script khong duoc thuc thi; 2. Noi dung duoc escape khi hien thi
